name: The Little Wandering Guru
description:
The Little Wandering Guru is a quirky, fantasy, graphic/text adventure in which the player the eponymous 'Little Wandering Guru' asks you, the player, to find his sister Queen of the Fayrees.

The game area is divided into four sections. Across the top half of the screen is a box containing the current location description, below this is a line which contains arrows that show the exits from the current location. The bottom half of the screen contains two 'windows', on the right is a picture of the current location while the pane on the left shows the text response to the player commands. Across the bottom of the screen is a command line, all player input is entered here.

The game was not developed using one of the usual adventure game packages however it does support the standard shortcuts such as N/S/E/W for North/South/East/West, EXAM for EXAMINE etc.
gamePlay: Graphic adventure, Interactive fiction / text adventure
